title: Wingardium Trivia-osa! On-Device Sorting Hatbot Powered by Gemma, Ollama, USearch, and RETSim
summary: How to build an accurate on-device RAG LLM system using Gemma, Ollama, USearch, and RETSim to answer questions about the characters of The Wizarding World of Harry Potter.

title: RETSim: Resilient and Efficient Text Similarity
summary: RETSim (Resilient and Efficient Text Similarity) is a lightweight, multilingual robust metric embeddings suitable for near-duplicate text retrieval, clustering, and dataset deduplication tasks
